PN-TBS-010422-01
The use of the Liebherr mobile tower without an adequately trained banksman/signaller.
The risks are the crane is positioned to carry out "blind" lifts and the banksman directing the lifts has not received adequate training to undertake lifting operations in a safe manner, giving rise to danger. The banksmen, including Artur Kaniowski, has not demonstrated that they have the skills, knowledge and experience to fulfil the role in a manner that secures the health and safety of any person affected by the project.
